short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TripZi recommends similar places using AI by extracting information from any website you're on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TripZi extracts locations info (website, Google Maps links, reviews, ratings, address) and recommends similar places using AI from any website you're on.
